roleset.name: ask for

example.name: sentential arg1
example.text: Cray Computer has applied *trace* to trade on Nasdaq.

example.name: PP arg1
example.text: Fireman 's Fund said it has applied for an exemption from these rate rollbacks.
example.arg: for an exemption from these rate rollbacks.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: Last year TCAC applied to the Council for Cultural Affairs for authorization to carry out a campaign to beautify Hsia Street .
example.arg: to the Council for Cultural Affairs
for authorization to carry out a campaign to beautify Hsia Street

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Data submitted their original approval applications before theFDA .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Larsen& Toubro started accepting applications for its giantissue earlier this month

example.name: with recipient only
example.text: The collective name for the application to the World Heritage Committee is " China 's Danxia Landforms " .

roleset.note:
APPLY-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, comparison with 'ask'. VN updated by Julia. No VNcls (although beg-58.2 is close). (from apply.01-v)
APPLICATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. (from application.01-n)

roleset.name: associate with, work at or on

example.name: active, all args
example.text: Mr. Bologna said the sale would allow Gen-Probe to speed up the development of new technology, and to more quickly apply existing technology to an array of diagnostic products.
example.arg: to an array of diagnostic products.

example.name: passivized
example.text: The gains are to be applied *trace* to fourth quarter or first-quarter results.
example.arg: to fourth quarter or first-quarter results.

example.name: ergative
example.text: The cash dividend paid on the common stock also will apply to the new shares.
example.arg: The cash dividend paid on the common stock

example.name: autogen1
example.text: their application to a particular new financial product
example.arg: to a particular new financial product

example.name: autogen2
example.text: laser applications for military space

example.name: arg1
example.text: The Board of Governors of the International Atomic Energy Agency is meeting today to examine the Iranian request for help in the nuclear project as one application of a recommendation presented at a meeting of the Technical Affairs Committee of the International Atomic Energy Agency to the head of the Agency .
example.arg: of a recommendation presented at a meeting of the Technical Affairs Committee of the International Atomic Energy Agency to the head of the Agency

example.name: with some argMs
example.text: It hurts to think of how many wonderful people in Iraq would now be alive , who have been horribly murdered and tortured and reduced to misery since by a half application of violence through sanctions and overflights .

example.name: all args
example.text: ...his application of these criteria to the stated circumstances.

APPLICATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Based on PB entry apply.02, which is a member of Vncls 105. (from application.02-n)

roleset.name: painting

example.name: from Kate
example.text: The paint was applied with a hard-bristle brush.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: When properly applied , the adhesive is designed to retain the windshield in place in a crash test at 30 miles per hour .

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Putty knives apply peanut butter well.

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The application of herbicide

example.name: all args
example.text: the decorator's sponge application of paint to the walls

APPLY-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. No VNcls (from apply.03-v)

roleset.name: specialized: apply brakes

example.name: vroom vroom
example.text: [Its still wants [*]to sit in the driver's seat, set the speed, step on the gas, apply the brakes and steer, with 120 million people in the back seat.

roleset.note: APPLY-V NOTES: Member of VNcls use-105. (from apply.04-v)

roleset.name: pertaining to, able to be applied (abstract)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Correct patient identity , procedure to be performed and as *PRO* applicable , correct side and site , correct patient position , and availability of implants , special equipment or special requirements .

roleset.note: APPLICABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. Relation to apply.02 (from applicable.02-j)
